text: Jairo Bueno Espinal (born 10 September 1998) is a Dominican and Spanish professional footballer who plays as a defender for Spanish club CD Sariñena. ==International career== Bueno made his professional debut for the Dominican Republic national football team in a 1-0 friendly over win Guadeloupe on 15 February 2019. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list the Dominican Republic's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! title: Jairo Bueno
